resources.string: Check how you perform, doing standard Ishihara test! At the end of the test you will receive color blindness scores deducted by our app.
Challenge your friends in this Ishihara solving test trial. Best scores achieved will be ranked on leaderboard!
If you want you can check your score on leaderboard now! To do so choose a displayed name and click submit button.

Your progress will not be saved.
